text: Patricia Rozema (born August 20, 1958) is a Canadian movie director. She is known for directing LGBT movies. She directed I've Heard the Mermaids Singing in 1987. She also directed When Night is Falling, which was released in autumn 1995 in the United States. Rozema was born in Kingston, Ontario. Category:Canadian movie directors Category:1958 births Category:Living people
title: Patricia Rozema
